document_api_meta.title: Get Return Records
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to get a list of return records.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: locale
request_query_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale codes for displaying the return reason, delimited by commas. Default: en-US
Refer to [Locale codes](678e3a47bae28f030a8c7523) for the list of supported locale codes.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^records
response_param.desc: A list of return records.

response_param.name: ^^event
response_param.desc: The type of order event. In this case, it will always be ORDER_RETURN.

response_param.name: ^^role
response_param.desc:
The role that initiated the order return request.
Possible values:
- BUYER
- SELLER
- OPERATOR: If the order is canceled by the customer service agent manually, then the cancel initiator will be 'OPERATOR'.
- SYSTEM: If the order is automatically canceled due to a policy reason, then the cancel initiator will be 'SYSTEM'.

response_param.name: ^^description
response_param.desc: Description of the return record.

response_param.name: ^^reason_text
response_param.desc: The corresponding text for a return reason, localized based on the locale input parameter.

response_param.name: ^^note
response_param.example: Reach an agreement with the buyer
response_param.desc: A note provided by the seller or buyer. You can use the role field to differentiate whether the note is from the seller or buyer.

response_param.name: ^^images
response_param.desc: Images provided by the seller or buyer. You can use the role field to differentiate whether the images are from the seller or buyer.

response_param.name: ^^^url
response_param.desc: URL of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^width
response_param.desc:
The width of image. 
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^height
response_param.desc:
The height of image.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^videos
response_param.desc: Videos uploaded by the buyer. Only buyers are allowed to upload videos.

response_param.name: ^^^url
response_param.desc: Video URL.

response_param.name: ^^^cover
response_param.desc: Video thumbnail image.

response_param.name: ^^^width
response_param.desc:
Video image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^height
response_param.desc:
Video image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^duration_millis
response_param.desc:
Video duration. 
Unit: milliseconds

response_param.name: ^^create_time
response_param.desc: The creation time for the return. Unix timestamp.

document_api_meta.response_body: {"code":0,"data":{"records":[{"event":"ORDER_RETURN","role":"Buyer","description":"Customer submitted a return request","reason_text":"Wrong product was sent","note":"Reach an agreement with the buyer","images":[{"url":"https://p16-oec-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/004797ebfd8c4d3da2df1cc4bfdb0614~tplv-o3syd03w52-origin-jpeg.jpeg?from=4246405447","width":200,"height":200}],"videos":[{"url":"https://v16m-default.akamaized.net/1e26046c3df91cd008d2ababba9445e2/65005d33/video/tos/maliva/tos-maliva-v-d8ca36-us/oQVCbIQemDpQxI9lHsg9IXQAb7mwgBabababab","cover":"https://p16-oec-va.ibyteimg.com/musically-maliva-obj/998d0381960bda1ef272f4a7724cf5ed~tplv-o3syd03w52-origin-jpeg.jpeg?from=4246405489","width":200,"height":200,"duration_millis":3000}],"create_time":1690532213}]},"message":"Success","request_id":"202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7"}

Node.js

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's return and refund requests.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your return and refund requests.

request_path_param.name: return_id
request_path_param.desc: A unique identifier for a TikTok Shop return request.
